top_comments.comment:
I'd really like to win the giveaway!
I'm italian so it's pretty common here to wear ADG as a signature.
Personally i don't have it, but i hope to add that to my collection :)

comments_since_last_sample.body: Aqua di gio is the best!
I've always wanted to add this fragrance to my collection, but everytime I find it discounted...I'm broke smh
I would like to enter the giveaway, I've tried clons of the ADG but not ADG itself, but I'm sure the real OG is something else.
I would love to enter the giveaway, my brother rocks Perry Ellis 360 red and I absolutely love it, but I have never tried ADG. Thank you Ash for the opportunity.

I have gotten a couple carded samples of the original Acqua Di Gio, and it's probably my wife's absolute favorite scent on me. I own, and absolutely love, Profumo. But haven't gotten around to purchase in the original yet which I really need to because, I'm not kidding, my way wife loves the stuff.
So I would love to win this. And I just celebrated my 12-year wedding anniversary, so it would be perfect.
I have many fresh Scents but ADG is still missing
I would like to be entered in the giveaway. I was gifted a bottle of ADG years ago but never rebought it. It would be neat to try it again.
I have personally only tried ADG but have never owned a bottle myself. Love your videos and keep up the great work!!
In fact I’m in love with it, but never bought it before. I would like to have it in my collection.
I would like to be entered for the giveaway. I have never rocked aqua di gio, but I'm certainly down to!

I'd really like to win the giveaway!
I'm italian so it's pretty common here to wear ADG as a signature.
Personally i don't have it, but i hope to add that to my collection :)
Count me in for the giveaway Ash! I used Acqua Di Gio a long time ago, never as a signature scent though. I have ADG Profumo now, and absolutely love it

Yes I would love to be entered in the giveaway. I have not tried or smelled the Original ADG. I do and wear Profumo and Profondo. Profumo is my favorite. Profondo was purchased through recommendation from You Ash. Thanks by the way!😅 U certainly know your stuff.

First love, wore it for years after going through 2 50ml and then 3 of the 3.4oz and then the 6.7oz. Never threw away any of the bottles because it's nostalgic for me now. Also currently rock the EDP. The perfect fragrance.
I have only tried ADG once and I loved it but never had the chance to buy it. Would be nice to win it.
I ROCKED Aqua Di GIO for years. I still wear it on occasion now. I could always use a backup bottle.
I loved ADG back in the day, like you Ash I'd wear it everywhere
Last year a friend of mine gifted me a bottle of adg and I finished in 2 months
Never tried the original but I am currently rocking Profumo
